bike.description: P. Series A1 Premium Aluminum, double-butted ORE DT, forged HT/ISCG BB/chainstay yoke/horizontal dropouts, integrated chain tensioner and axle carrier, multispeed hardware, disc only, 6mm offset rear triangle

components.description: Marzocchi DJ1, 80mm, Alloy steerer and 32mm stanchions, 1pc. magnesium lower w/ 20mm through axle, cold forged alloy crown, open bath damping w/ rebound adj., air assist "stiff" coil spring w/ preload adj., disc only
